Description.Text: The rooms on Seven Hotel are stylishly decorated to make your stay more pleasant. All of them have satellite TV, mini bar, free wifi connection, air conditioning and room service. The Seven Hotel offers Albanian and Italian cuisine in our spacious and charming restaurant. We also present a great area for any kind of events such as training, workshops, seminars, meetings etc. All rooms will hold a maximum capacity of 60 people. Facilities ▪ Wireless Internet ▪ Restaurant and Bar ▪ Banquet/Function Facilities ▪ Cafe Shop ▪ Car Parking ▪ Meeting Room ▪ Photocopier and Fax Services ▪ Room Service ▪ Daily Housekeeping ▪ Dry Cleaning ▪ Foreign Currency Exchange ▪ Laundry/Ironing ▪ Postal/Courier Service ▪ Lifeguard ▪ 24 hrs Security Guard

Hotel is perfectly located in the idyllic town of Tirana, in one of the liveliest areas of Tirana, close to some tourist gems and to an assorted mix of restaurants, bars, and traditional shops. All the general facilities are only a few steps from your hotel room.
